```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
a = c(1, 2, 3, 4)
b = c(2, 3, 4, "a")

d = data.frame(
  a = a,
  b = b
)

kable(d, format = "html", align = "c") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "responsive"))

which(b == c(2, 3))
```
